Greens for Done ✅, Blues for Planned, Yellows for In Progress, Gray for Someday. Use calming tones.
Warm, human, encouraging. Avoid legal jargon. Example: 'Helping Hands' instead of 'Executor Checklist'.
Encouragement: 'You’re doing wonderfully.' | Gentle framing: 'One step at a time — good enough beats perfect.'
